lead_paragraph: After widespread confusion in the September primary and the firing of the elections board director, poll watchers hope to minimize any malfunctions.
snippet: After widespread confusion in the September primary and the firing of the elections board director, poll watchers hope to minimize any malfunctions.

headline.main: A Host of Monitors Will Watch the City’s Electronic Voting
headline.seo: New York Electronic Voting to Be Closely Watched
headline.print_headline: A Host of Monitors Will Watch the City’s Electronic Voting
